dimensions.label: Relationship Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin build relationships with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively listen and understand the emotions and needs of those around them.
Your FarTwin will be direct, confident, and unafraid to express their own needs and desires.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage finances?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and minimizing expenses, avoiding unnecessary spending.
Your FarTwin will be willing to spend money freely, prioritizing experiences and luxury over frugality.

dimensions.label: Intellectual Curiosity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning and personal growth?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on analyzing data, studying, and understanding complex concepts.
Your FarTwin will be open to exploring new ideas, taking risks, and embracing creative expression.

dimensions.label: Physical Activity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach physical exercise?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize flexibility, enjoyment, and relaxation in their workout routine.
Your FarTwin will focus on pushing themselves to the limit, striving for peak physical performance.

dimensions.label: Group Dynamics
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with groups of people?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assert themselves, take charge, and lead the group.
Your FarTwin will listen actively, contribute to discussions, and work with others towards a common goal.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems systematically, analyzing data and following a clear logic.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts, rely on gut feelings, and make decisions based on intuition.

dimensions.label: Digital Literacy
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate digital platforms?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly skilled in using technology, leveraging it to enhance their daily life.
Your FarTwin will use digital tools as needed, but won't delve deeply into technical details or explore advanced features.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on established art forms, such as painting or music, to express their creativity.
Your FarTwin will be open to exploring new and unconventional methods of creative expression.
